message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll be very satisfied with it. How about $160?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $100 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you try to do better? I'm willing to meet you at $115. Can you meet me there?
